cmp: 合 (one-tenth of a peck, Chinese musical note/fit/to join)
mng: to, for, for the benefit of, to give, to allow, to do sth (for sb), (grammatical equivalent of 被), (grammatical equivalent of 把), (sentence intensifier)

exm.mng: to send, to give as a present
to accord, to give, to show (respect)
to issue, to grant, to distribute
to give to, to provide to, to bring to, to take to
to give, to deliver, to hand over
to furnish, to provide, supply (as in supply and demand)
to present to, to offer to
